caption: Table 1: Quantitative comparison against baselines using X-CLIP and VideoScore.
description: This table presents a quantitative comparison of the proposed 4Real model against three baseline methods (4Dfy, Dream-in-4D, and AYG) using two evaluation metrics: X-CLIP and VideoScore.  X-CLIP assesses visual quality, temporal consistency, dynamic degree, text-video alignment, and factual consistency. VideoScore provides a numerical evaluation of video quality.  Higher scores indicate better performance.
